title: The Warriors Staff Lied To Kevin Durant (feat. Jeremy Piven)
itunes:author: Andrew Schulz's Flagrant with Akaash Singh
itunes:summary: This week Andrew, Akaash, Kaz, and special guest, Jeremy Piven (known for his role as Ari Gold in the comedy series Entourage), discuss #METOO, going from acting to stand up, the 1 year anniversary of Frank and Beans, NBA Finals, KD injury,  Nets Trade, Warriors asterisk championships and MUCH MORE!

description: This week Andrew, Akaash, Kaz, and special guest, Jeremy Piven (known for his role as Ari Gold in the comedy series Entourage), discuss #METOO, going from acting to stand up, the 1 year anniversary of Frank and Beans, NBA Finals, KD injury,  Nets Trade, Warriors asterisk championships and MUCH MORE!
